thread.title: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case

title: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case
text: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) LOS ANGELES (AP) — Bill Cosby has replaced his longtime lawyer in a pair of lawsuits filed by women claiming they were sexually abused by the comedian decades ago. Cosby’s new attorney, Christopher Tayback, filed a form on Friday reflecting that he was replacing Cosby’s longtime attorney, Martin Singer, in the case. Singer had been […]
